input_args.passage: 'Ernst Messerschmid/Date of birth | May 21, 1945, Ernst Willi Messerschmid (born 21 May 1945) is a German physicist and former astronaut. Born in Reutlingen, Germany, Messerschmid finished the Technisches Gymnasium in Stuttgart in 1965., 21 May 1945'
